title: Museum Orientation Tour in Mandarin
hero_caption: <p>Unknown Artist. <em>The Golden Era of the New South Union Phoenix, The ETV&amp;G Railway System</em>, n.d. The Art Institute of Chicago, RX20769/998.</p>
description:
2017年5月20日
下午1:00-2:00
100展厅
入馆参观者可免费参加

Whether you're a new visitor or a seasoned member, the Art Institute can be overwhelming. It is one of the world's great encyclopedic art museums, which means that it is big. Very big. If you would like an overview or simply want to gain more working knowledge, this tour is a great place to start. This tour will be conducted in Mandarin.
不管你是第一次参观还是博物馆的会员，芝加哥艺术博物馆的美都是难以置信的。作为世界上最好的百科全书式博物馆之一，芝加哥艺术博物馆非常的大。如果你想对博物馆有一个整体的概念，或者仅仅想要获得一些实用的知识，这次导览都会是一个绝佳的开始。此次参观采用中文讲解。

Topics include:

Getting from point A to point Z (via points B through Y)
从A点到Z点（经过B点到Y点）
How the buildings connect with one another
各座建筑之间是如何互相连接的
How the collections are arranged individually and flow into one another
这些展品是如何单独且有序地排列的
Interesting and little-known facts about the museum and its collections
博物馆和馆内藏品的一些小众且有趣地知识

Join us in Gallery 100 (at the base of the Grand Staircase) and begin from the beginning.
请在100展厅（位于主楼梯底层）集合，让我们从博物馆的入口处开始导览。
